name: You have notified the court of your intention to apply
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

The court has notified your ((partner)) by email that you are intending to apply for a final order as a sole applicant. 

You will be able to apply for a final order from ((date plus 14 days)). You will receive an email to remind you. 

You do not need to do anything now. 

Divorce and Dissolution 
HM Courts & Tribunals Service 
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm) 

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: You have said you intend to apply for a final order
